cursedblade.name: Cursed Blade
cursedblade.bonus: Attacks have a 20% chance to Shrink (-1 enemy star, down to level 0).

deathblade.name: Death Blade
deathblade.bonus: On a kill or assist, gain an additional 15 Attack Damage until end of combat (Stacks infinitely). Starts with one stack.

frozenheart.name: Frozen Heart
frozenheart.bonus: Adjacent enemies lose 35% Attack Speed for 1 second.

giantslayer.name: Giant Slayer
giantslayer.bonus: Attacks deal an additional 5% enemy max Health as True Damage.

guardianangel.name: Guardian Angel
guardianangel.bonus: Revives champion with 500 HP after 2 seconds.

guinsoosrageblade.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
guinsoosrageblade.bonus: Attacks give 5% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.

hextechgunblade.name: Hextech Gunblade
hextechgunblade.bonus: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.

handofjustice.name: Hand of Justice
handofjustice.bonus: At round start, the wearer randomly gains either 40% increased damage or 40 life on hit.

hush.name: Hush
hush.bonus: Attacks have a 33% chance on hit to prevent the enemy champion from gaining mana (Mana Lock) for 4 seconds.

iceborngauntlet.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
iceborngauntlet.bonus: On dodge, create an expandable zone that lowers Attack Speed by 35%.

ionicspark.name: Ionic Spark
ionicspark.bonus: Whenever an enemy casts a spell they take 125 True damage.

locketoftheironsolari.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
locketoftheironsolari.bonus: On start of combat, allies 2 spaces to the left and right gain 300 shield for 8 seconds.

ludensecho.name: Luden's Echo
ludensecho.bonus: Deal 180 splash damage on ability hit.

morellonomicon.name: Morellonomicon
morellonomicon.bonus: Spells burn for 20% of max HP over 10 seconds and reduce healing effects by 80%.

phantomdancer.name: Phantom Dancer
phantomdancer.bonus: Wearer dodges all Critical Strikes including Ability Critical Strikes.

redbuff.name: Red Buff
redbuff.bonus: Attacks burn for 13% of max HP over 10 seconds and reduce healing effects by 80%.

redemption.name: Redemption
redemption.bonus: Upon reaching 30% health, heal all nearby allies for 1200 HP.

repeatingcrossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
repeatingcrossbow.bonus: On death, this jumps to an allied champion and grants an additional 30% Attack Speed & Critical Strike chance.

runaanshurricane.name: Runaan's Hurricane
runaanshurricane.bonus: Attacks hit 1 additional enemy. This extra hit does 75% damage and applies on-hit effects.

seraphsembrace.name: Runaan's Hurricane
seraphsembrace.bonus: Regain 20 mana each time a spell is cast.

spearofshojin.name: Spear of Shojin
spearofshojin.bonus: After casting, gain 18% of max mana per attack.

statikkshiv.name: Statikk Shiv
statikkshiv.bonus: Every 3rd attack deals 100 splash magical damage to 3 enemies.

swordbreaker.name: Sword Breaker
swordbreaker.bonus: Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm for 3 seconds.

thiefsgloves.name: Thief's Gloves
thiefsgloves.bonus: This item takes all three item slots. On round begin, copy two random items.

quicksilver.name: Quicksilver
quicksilver.bonus: Prevents the next crowd control effect applied to the wearer. Refreshes every 3 seconds.

thornmail.name: Thornmail
thornmail.bonus: Reflect 100% of physical damage mitigated as Magic Damage.

titanichydra.name: Titanic Hydra
titanichydra.bonus: Attacks deal 3% Max Health to target and adjacent enemies behind them.

trapclaw.name: Trap Claw
trapclaw.bonus: The wearer starts combat with a spell shield. Stun the enemy that breaks the shield for 4 seconds.

zekesherald.name: Zeke's Herald
zekesherald.bonus: On start of combat, allies 2 spaces to the left and right gain +15% Attack Speed.

zephyr.name: Zephyr
zephyr.bonus: On start of combat banish an enemy for 6 seconds.
